hero.title: Your clipboard,
hero.description: Move text and images between all your devices safely, quickly, and seamlessly. Eliminate friction and let creativity flow freely.

features.title: Built for Fast, Local, Private Sync
features.subtitle: Pair once. After that, your devices reconnect automatically on the same network - end-to-end encrypted.

fast.title: Near-instant LAN sync
fast.description: Pair once, then UniClipboard reconnects automatically on your local network. No "send" button. No repeated confirmations.

minimalist.title: Runs quietly in the background
minimalist.description: No cluttered UI. No constant pop-ups. Native shortcuts and system-level integration.

privacy.title: Local-first. End-to-end encrypted.
privacy.description: Your clipboard data stays on your devices and is encrypted by default. Only you can access your content.

history.title: Search when you need it
history.description: Find recent text and links in seconds. You stay in control of what gets stored and for how long.

cta.note: LAN sync first. Remote sync later.

howItWorks.title: How LAN Sync Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A one-time pairing step, then automatic reconnection on your local network.

step1.title: Pair Devices (One-time)
step1.description: Confirm trust once. Approve a pairing request to establish a trusted relationship between devices.

step2.title: Auto Reconnect on LAN
step2.description: No manual steps after pairing. When your devices are on the same network, UniClipboard reconnects in the background.

step3.title: Sync Securely
step3.description: Encrypted, direct, local-first. Clipboard data is encrypted before it leaves your device and synced directly over your network.

trust.title: Your Data, Yours Alone
trust.description: We use zero-knowledge encryption, meaning decryption keys never leave your device. We provide the infrastructure, and you retain complete data control.
